section.docs:
Comments work like comments in every system. You can create comments about many different things. Comments may also have files attached.
These resources support comments:
1. Todos 2. Meetings 3. Phone Calls 4. Deals 5. Messages (IM, SMS, & Email) 6. Activities

section.title: Routes & Permissions
section.docs: * `POST /deals/:id/comments`: All users * `POST /todos/:id/comments`: All users * `POST /meetings/:id/comments`: All users * `POST /phone_calls/:id/comments`: All users * `POST /messages/:id/comments`: All users * `POST /activities/:id/comments`: All users * `PUT /comments/:id`: Your comments only or God * `DELETE /comments/:id`: Your comments only or God

section.title: Attributes
section.docs:
text
Required
The full text for this comment
attachments
All the attachments for this comment. See the attachment sections for the format.
user
ID for the user who wrote the comment
